verses.verse: Now these are the commandments <S%H4687><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, that you might do them in the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H5674><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>:

That you might fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> all his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, you, and your son, and your son <S%H1121><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%>; and that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged <S%H748><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> therefore <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel, and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H3190><s%>; that it may be well with you <S%H7235><s%>, and that you may increase mightily <S%H3966><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has promised <S%H1696><s%> you <S%H776><s%>, in the land that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is one <S%H259><s%> Lord <S%H3068><s%>:
And you shall love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>, and with all your might <S%H3966><s%>.
And these words <S%H1697><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, shall be in your heart <S%H3824><s%>:

And you shall teach them diligently <S%H8150><s%> unto your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and shall talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when you sit <S%H3427><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%>, and when you walk <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and when you lie down <S%H7901><s%>, and when you rise up <S%H6965><s%>.
And you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall be as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the door-posts <S%H4201><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%>, and on your gates <S%H8179><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H3068><s%>, when the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> shall have brought <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, which you built not <S%H1129><s%>,

And houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all good <S%H2898><s%> things <S%H4390><s%>, which you fill not <S%H953><s%>, and wells dug <S%H2672><s%>, which you dig <S%H2672><s%> not <S%H3754><s%>, vineyards and olive trees <S%H2132><s%>, which you plant <S%H5193><s%> not <S%H398><s%>; when you shall have eaten and be full <S%H7646><s%>;

Then beware <S%H8104><s%> lest you forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
You shall fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H7650><s%>, and shall swear by his name <S%H8034><s%>.
You shall not go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> which are round about you <S%H5439><s%>;

(For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H639><s%>) lest the anger of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H8045><s%>, and destroy you from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
You shall not tempt <S%H5254><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as you tempted <S%H5254><s%> him in Massah <S%H4532><s%>.

You shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which he has commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.

And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with you <S%H935><s%>, and that you may go in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>,
To cast out <S%H1920><s%> all your enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, as the Lord has spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And when your son <S%H1121><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What mean the testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has commanded you <S%H6680><s%>?

Then you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto your son <S%H1121><s%>, We were Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s bondmen <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%>, great <S%H1419><s%> and severe <S%H7451><s%>, upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his household <S%H1004><s%>, before our eyes <S%H5869><s%>:
And he brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from there <S%H935><s%>, that he might bring us in, to give <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to do <S%H6213><s%> all these statutes <S%H2706><s%>, to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, for our good <S%H2896><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that he might preserve us alive <S%H2421><s%>, as it is at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be our righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, if we observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all these <S%H2063><s%> commandments <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, as he has commanded us <S%H6680><s%>.
